mapper.select: SELECT s.*, d.departmentName, NOW()time FROM Student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id
SELECT s.*, d.departmentName FROM Student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{srchText},'%')
SELECT s.*, d.departmentName FROM Student s LEFT JOIN department d ON s.departmentId = d.id WHERE s.departmentId = #{departmentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT Student (studentNumber, name, departmentId, year) VALUES (#{studentNumber}, #{name}, #{departmentId}, #{year})
